content: 2021 non-fiction book by Rosalind Galt ***Alluring Monsters: The Pontianak and Cinemas of Decolonization*** is a non-fiction book by Rosalind Galt. Published in 2021 by [Columbia University Press](/wiki/Columbia_University_Press), it discusses Galt's analysis of the mythological [Pontianaks](/wiki/Kuntilanak) in post-colonial Singapore and Malay media. ## General references - Cortez, Iggy (2022-06-01).
